post:
PhotonVPS features an array of Enterprise VPS Hosting solutions to meet the needs of any prospective customer. A wide range of our Enterprise VPS Hosting include OpenVZ, Xen, and Windows virtualization which can be used for the following:

VPN Tunnel, PPTP, Email Server for Work Group, Intranet System, Database, Game Server MMORPG, General Websites, Webhosting, Reseller Hosting and MORE!

- We do not oversell our services.
- All VPS include SolusVM Access
- Semi-managed solutions
- Weekly backups on separate hard drive for fast extraction.
- BBB Accredited Business since 2004 with A Rating!
- ShopperApproved gives us 5 Stars!
- Disaster Planning N+2 Setup (Hardware, Generators, AC, Routers, Switches, Staff!)
- In-housed Onsite Staff!
- Ksplice Uptrack - Keeping your parent nodes up to date without reboots!
- You can view our ASN here: http://bgp.he.net/AS40676

All plans come with the following:

- Instant Setup (Depending on availability)
- 30-days money back guarantee
- Dual Intel Quad Xeon CPU nodes
- Enterprise Supermicro hardware (Fast hot swappable bays)
- Enterprise Western Digital Hard Drives
- Enterprise RAID10 with BBU!
- 100mbit Dedicated (Not Shared) Per VPS Node
- Fast UPGRADES
- Limit 15 VPS per node!
- Choice of Linux OS: CentOS, Fedora, Debian, Ubuntu, Gentoo, Slackware, FreeBSD, OpenBSD, Scientific Linux
